snippet: The George London Foundation paired the prominent American mezzo-soprano Vivica Genaux and the Canadian bass-baritone Daniel Okulitch for a recital.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews recital by American mezzo-soprano Vivica Genaux and Canadian bass-baritone Daniel Okulitch at Morgan Library & Museum, presented by George London Foundation.
lead_paragraph: The George London Foundation paired the prominent American mezzo-soprano Vivica Genaux and the Canadian bass-baritone Daniel Okulitch for a recital.

headline.seo: Vivica Genaux and Daniel Okulitch at Morgan Library & Museum
